name: Jos√© Aleixo
tagline: Informatics and Computation Egineering Student at Faculty of Engineering of University of Porto
body:
### Who am I?
I'm currently a somewhat normal human being, with 20 years of existence. I'm quite fond of programming and computers in general. I like to think I have great taste in music and clothing. Oh, I also run... like a lot. 

### What do I do?
Besides breathing every once in a while, I have knowledge in several programming languages, such as Java, C/C++, HTML&CSS and a little bit of Python (I'm working on it, okay?). I'm Portuguese, but also speak English (as you may have noticed) and ein bisschen Deutsch, having taken a whole year of German classes.

You can see some of my university and personal projects at @jazzchipc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
